name: GHOST TOWN (itch) (Bug Baker Games)
description:
It’s Halloween. Two young children named Steve and Eva are left home alone, after their parents go out for a dinner date. After a while, the older brother, Steve, proposes the idea that they should watch a spooky movie. As always for the two, this conversation turns into an argument. This dilemma is soon paused by an ambush, kidnapping the two and knocking Steve out.

Steve wakes up in a cemetery in the middle of nowhere. He’s left with a gun by his side, strangely. He sees coins scattered around the place as well as... ghosts!? Stranded and alone, Steve has no idea of what to do. What he does know is that he must find his sister as well as the abductor.

Play as Steve in this short Halloween experience and push past all of the threats with your trusty rifle in hand. Who knows? You just might make it all the way!

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

E - Interact

M - Menu

LMB - Shoot

R - Reload
